g:VerticalPanel.g:HTML:
Below is a list of existing Emory AWS Services that you can view or edit.
These reside in the database associated to the Emory AWS ESB Service. The Emory AWS Service is authoritatative for AWS Service objects and allows applications like this one to query, create, update and delete those objects.
Click the 'Add Service' button to go to the Service maintenance page where you can create a new Emory AWS Service.
